price: They say, “O you to whom the Reminder has been sent down, You are surely insane[3]!
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
footnotes: [3] These deriding remarks were very hard on the Prophet (ﷺ), and Allah consoles him in this surah.
